clean.description: Delete all messages sent by you in the last number of messages in the channel the command was executed in
clean.tips:
You can put "all" as the number to delete every message sent by you in the channel the command was executed in
You can also put "stop" as the number to stop all current cleaning

spam.description: Spam the given message a number of times
spam.tips: You can put "stop" as the number to stop all current spamming

spoiler.description: Put a spoiler around every letter to make it annoying to read

hide.description: Hide text so that it still functions, but isn't shown
hide.tips: This can be used to hide link text that have embeds, hide invites while keeping the join button, or hiding pings

ping.description: Get the latency of the selfbot

uptime.description: Get the amount of time that the selfbot has been running

chatexport.description: Export the chat and save it as an html

servericon.description: Get the server icon of the current/inputted server
servericon.tips: If you don't put a server ID, it will get the icon of the server the command was run in

avatar.description: Get the avatar of a user

revavatar.description: Reverse Google search a user's avatar

exportfriends.description: Export your friend list to a txt file

memberinfo.tips: Can only be used in servers

roleinfo.tips: Can only be used in servers

ipinfo.description: Get information about the given IP address

nitro.description: Generate a number of random nitro classic code

timer.description: Set a timer for a duration
timer.tips: You can use shorthand for time.(1m = 60 seconds) If a user is input, they will get pinged when the timer is over

kick.description: Kick the inputted member with given reason
kick.tips: You can mention the user or put in their user ID to kick them. Reason is optional

ban.description: Ban the inputted member with given reason
ban.tips: You can mention the user or put in their user ID to ban them. Reason is optional

nuke.description: Nuke(delete and recreate) the current/inputted channel
nuke.tips: If you don't tag or put in a channel ID, it will nuke the current channel

nuketimer.description: Show a countdown until the channel is nuked and send a nuke gif afterwards
nuketimer.tips: If you don't tag or put in a channel ID, it will nuke the current channel

destroyserver.description: Delete all channels, roles, etc. and spam new ones
destroyserver.tips:
The name will be used for channel naming, role naming, and server naming. It will default to your title if not set
Uh oh... Where's the undo button. Bye bye server

spamchannel.tips: The name will be used for channel naming. It will default to your title if not set

spamrole.tips: The name will be used to role naming. It will default to your title if not set

tokennuke.description: Destroy a token and mess with it making it almost impossible to use that account

prefix.description: Change the prefix of Glass Selfbot

title.description: Change the title that shows up in the help menu

deletetimer.description: Change the delete timer for some commands that delete automatically

giveawaydelay.description: Change the delay for the giveaway sniper

reload.description: Reload the configs of Glass Selfbot if you change something manually
reload.tips: Some changes will still require a restart

tweet.description: Create a fake tweet with a given name and text
tweet.tips: If the name is multiple words, put quotes around it

glassavatar.description: Put a glass texture over a user's avatar

wasted.description: Put a wasted overlay on a user's avatar

triggered.description: Put a triggered overlay on a user's avatar

invert.description: Invert the colors of a user's avatar

rjoin.description: All the tokens join a server using an invite code(last group of characters of an invite link)

rleave.description: All the tokens leave a server using a server ID

rspam.description: All the tokens spam a message in a channel a number of times

rlag.description: All the tokens send a lag message in channel a number of times

daddchannel.description: Add a channel to the event channel list(automatically join Dank Memer events)

dremovechannel.description: Remove a channel from the event channel list(automatically join Dank Memer events)

dwhitelist.description: Toggle automatic Dank Memer event joining between whitelist and blacklist for channel filter

descriptions.UT1L1TY: Information About Discord, I.E Ping,Token,Avatar Info
descriptions.4DM1N: Commands to help with administrating or moderating a server
descriptions.4BUS3: Modules That Can Destroy Servers in Seconds.
descriptions.1M4G3: Modules That Modify You or Someone Eles's Avatar
descriptions.R41D: Raid Servers With You're Stored Tokens
